ygData.msgSnippet: The so-called Lizzie waits while Amperion is in CR. She sniffs around, only wanting to cause some mischief. She goes to the next CR chamber and reaches inside,

The so-called Lizzie waits while Amperion is in CR. She sniffs around, 
only wanting to cause some mischief. She goes to the next CR chamber 
and reaches inside, pulling some wires and effectively making it 
dysfunctionnal. She smiles inside, just imagining what the Maxies will 
look like when they get in that one!
